name: AKIBA'S TRIP: Undead & Undressed - Kati's Route + Complete Outfit Set
name_original: AKIBA'S TRIP: Undead & Undressed - Kati's Route + Complete Outfit Set
description:
This bundle contains the all-new Kati's Route and all four outfits from the Complete Outfit Set.


Experience the “true ending” of AKIBA'S TRIP: Undead & Undressed for the very first time. When a mysterious and malevolent force slumbering inside lovable Finnish maid Kati awakens, will you be able to do whatever it takes to save her?


Equip these outfits to cosplay as Rui Fumizuki, Sena Kitada, Mana Kitada, and Sara from AKIBA'S TRIP: Hellbound & Debriefed.
This DLC will unlock all four outfits for purchase in-game.

This set contains the following items:

  • Kati's Route DLC Upgrade
  • Rui Fumizuki's Outfit
  • Sena Kitada's Outfit
  • Mana Kitada's Outfit
  • Sara's Outfit

*You will need the base game (sold separately) and the latest version of the software to use this DLC.
